nodes.text: Image was a Fallanassi power. The power allowed a Fallanassi to create a realistic, three-dimensional image that was indistinguishable from the real thing. The image was convincing visually, audibly, and even behaviourally; at least, to the limit of the knowledge of the Fallanassi creating the image. If the user had not seen the object or person they were attempting to recreate, then the image could fail o rbe unconvincing.
